ingredients.content: 150 g dark chocolate (50% cocoa solids), small pieces or callets
70 g milk chocolate, small pieces or callets
120 g unsalted butter, diced, plus extra for greasing

preparations.content: Place dark chocolate and milk chocolate in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add sugar, flour and eggs then mix <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>. Divide mixture between prepared ramekins. Cover each ramekin with heat-resistant cling film and place in Varoma dish. Clean mixing bowl.

Place water in mixing bowl, place covered Varoma into position and steam <b>35 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Remove Varoma, carefully remove Varoma lid and leave cakes to cool for approx. 10 minutes. Carefully remove cling film and unmould cakes with a table knife. Serve with vanilla ice cream and mixed fresh berries.
